author: nflaig
content:
Hey zkEVM friends, just an update from Lodestar side that we have an image `ethpandaops/lodestar:optional-proofs-77ebb45` now that can interop with Lighthouse and Prysm

We have gossip, req/resp  and beacon apis implemented, as well as new CLI flags to enable it`--activateZkvm` and few others to tweak parameters like `--chain.minProofsRequired` and `--chain.zkvmGenerationProofTypes`

only tested with a dummy prover so we are not actually validating proofs yet

author: codygunton
content: I started looking into testing the RISC-V extension Zicclsm today and learned that they are / will be covered in a new branch [act4](https://github.com/riscv-non-isa/riscv-arch-test/blob/act4/ctp/src/zi.adoc#zicclsm-misaligned-loadsstores) of riscv-arch-test, the  [RISCOF testing framework is deprecated](https://github.com/riscv-non-isa/riscv-arch-test/blob/f970fe843c4294837be34804977853ad3cd01f5c/README.md?plain=1#L5), and the act4 branch [will become that canonical branch of riscv-arch-test](https://lists.riscv.org/g/sig-arch-test/topic/notice_update/117795984) sometime this week (RISC-V membership needed, see screenshot).  So I guess I will be overhauling the [RISC-V test monitor](https://github.com/eth-act/zkevm-test-monitor). Seems like a positive change though--RISCOF was a big slow and quirky.
